ROIC OVERVIEW 7
In 2021 and 2022, Retail Opportunity Investments Corp. was selected as a 
Green Lease Leader by the U.S. Department of Energy’s Better Buildings 
Alliance and the Institute for Market Transformation. Specifically, ROIC 
received the designation of “Gold” in recognition of efforts to incorporate 
crucial energy efficiency, cost savings, air quality and sustainability criteria 
into its leases. See this link for more information on Green Lease Leaders.
